C

call_Bat() - Method in class parameter_estimation.CKEmulation
calls the .bat file that sets environment variables for proper use of future Chemkin calls
call_GetSol(boolean) - Method in class parameter_estimation.CKEmulation
processes the xmldata.zip file using Chemkin GetSolution executable
call_Preprocess() - Method in class parameter_estimation.CKEmulation
call the Chemkin preprocessor chem and produces the linking file (.asc)
call_Process() - Method in class parameter_estimation.CKEmulation
call a Chemkin reactor model (ic: CKReactorPlugFlow) executable
call_Transpose() - Method in class parameter_estimation.CKEmulation
calls the Chemkin CKSolnTranspose executable
checkChemInput() - Method in class parameter_estimation.CKEmulation
checkChemInput does a preliminary check of the initial chemistry output file to verify if no errors are present.
It therefore calls the Chemkin preprocessor which produces the output file
This output file is read, and the String " NO ERRORS FOUND ON INPUT: " is sought.
If this String is not present, System.exit(-1) is called
chemkinDir - Variable in class parameter_estimation.CKEmulation
 
ckcsv_name - Variable in class parameter_estimation.CKEmulation
 
CKEmulation - Class in parameter_estimation
CKEmulation is designed as a Thread type, implying that multiple CKEmulations can be initiated, allowing multithreading and possible speed-up
CKEmulation can call several Chemkin routines: Chem, CKReactorPlugFlow, GetSolution, GetSolnTranspose depending on the task to be executed
In order to cope with a limited number of Chemkin licenses, a counting Semaphore type is used to keep track of the number of licenses in use

CKSolnList - Variable in class parameter_estimation.CKEmulation
 
createSolnList() - Method in class parameter_estimation.CKEmulation
createSolnList creates the CKSolnList.txt file by calling the "GetSolution -listonly" routine
